mapper.insert: INSERT INTO usertable (user_id, user_pw, user_name, phone, birthday, gender) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{phone}, #{birthday}, #{gender})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, user_pw, user_name, 'ROLE_' || grade as grade FROM user_login_view WHERE user_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hospital (hospital_id, hospital_pw, hospital_name, address, phone, hospital_img, main_subject, director_name, director_phone, director_license, holiday, opentime, closetime) VALUES (#{hospitalId}, #{hospitalPw}, #{hospitalName}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{hospitalImg}, #{mainSubject}, #{directorName}, #{directorPhone}, #{directorLicense}, #{holiday}, #{opentime}, #{closetime})
